reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 494/97: LEVYING AND COLLECTING BY ALTERNATIVE BOARDS
reg_info.reg_name_text: LEVYING AND COLLECTING BY ALTERNATIVE BOARDS

content.content: 4. The James Bay Lowlands Secondary School Board shall perform the duties imposed on The Moose Factory Island District School Area Board by subsection 255 (1), section 256 and paragraph 3 of subsection 257.7 (1) of the Act and subsection 21.1 (1) of the Provincial Land Tax Act respecting the levying and collecting of rates, taxes or tax rates, as the case may be, in the area of jurisdiction of The Moose Factory Island District School Area Board.  O. Reg. 494/97, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. The James Bay Lowlands Secondary School Board shall perform the duties imposed on The Moose Factory Island District School Area Board by subsection 255 (1), section 256 and paragraph 3 of subsection 257.7 (1) of the Act and subsection 21.1 (1) of the Provincial Land Tax Act respecting the levying and collecting of rates, taxes or tax rates, as the case may be, in the area of jurisdiction of The Moose Factory Island District School Area Board.  O. Reg. 494/97, s. 4.

content.content: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 494/97, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 494/97, s. 5.
